update.description:
This pull request changes `Entity.hh` to use `ignition::math`. This is just the first part of changing Entity.hh. 

The biggest change is conversion of the `GetWorldPose` function.
update.title: Entity ignmath

content.raw: I added some `const` qualifiers to improve the consistency. please review c2e5d0a6b4e8 before merging
content.html: I added some const qualifiers to improve the consistency. please review c2e5d0a6b4e8 before merging

content.raw: add `const` here and elsewhere in this file for consistency? (see my other comment)

content.raw:
this is inconsistent; these `bool`s aren't `const` in the header file

I like them being `const` but we probably need to make them all consistent
content.html:
this is inconsistent; these bools aren't const in the header file

I like them being const but we probably need to make them all consistent

xenial

Homebrew

Windows
